Title: Instalação do WPS Office com tradução e dicionário em português brasileiro no AviX
Description:
Para instalar o WPS Office no AviX com tradução e dicionário no idioma português brasileiro, execute os seguintes comandos no terminal:
(Para abrir o terminal, pressione Ctrl+Alt+T)

cd ~/Downloads

wget -c http://kdl.cc.ksosoft.com/wps-community/download/a19/wps-office_9.1.0.4975~a19p1_amd64.deb

wget -c http://kdl.cc.ksosoft.com/wps-community/download/a15/wps-office-fonts_1.0_all.deb

wget -c http://sourceforge.net/projects/avix/files/repository/recommends/wps%20office/wps-office-mui-pt-br_1.1.0-0kaiana1_all.deb

wget -c http://sourceforge.net/projects/avix/files/repository/recommends/wps%20office/wps-office-dicts-pt-br_1.0.0-0kaiana060914_all.deb

sudo dpkg -i ~/Downloads/wps-*.deb

wget -c http://sourceforge.net/projects/avix/files/repository/recommends/wps%20office/wps_symbol_fonts.zip

sudo unzip ~/Downloads/wps_symbol_fonts.zip -d /usr/share/fonts/wps-office/

sudo mv -v /opt/kingsoft/wps-office/office6/dict/pt_BR /opt/kingsoft/wps-office/office6/dicts/
